##What is Included?##

* Server locations: Los Angeles, New Jersey, and France
* All of the virtual servers come with at least 100Mbps port speed
* The servers are unmanaged, and you should manage it by your self, but we will help you as much as we can.
* All of the Servers include 1 IPv4, and you can order more if you need. IPv6 addresses are free.

>**OVZ-256**  
> RAM 256/512  
> DISK SPACE 20 GB  
> CPU 1  
> TRANSFER 200 GB  
> 1 IPv4  
> **$4/month or $46/year**  
> Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=96
  

We have more packages! Didnt see somthing you need? check our website for additional packages that may suit your needs!

Order our Virtual Private Servers: http://www.supremebytes.com/virtual-private-servers.php

>**OVZ-512**  
> RAM 512/1024   
> DISK SPACE 50 GB  
> CPU 1    
> TRANSFER 500 GB  
> 1 IPv4  
> **$7/month** or $78/yearly  
> Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=92

All packages are available on monthly, quarterly, and yearly terms.

Extra IPv4 Addresses are $2.00 monthly

Accepted payment types: PayPal and 2CheckOut  
Location: Los Angeles  
OpenVZ with SolusVM Management  
Terms of Service: http://www.supremebytes.com/terms-of-service.php
